stage_identity.evidence: Teen Byte clearly visible with canonical gangly limbs, cyan-blue coloration, and proper proportions. The teen form matches the stage anchor reference.

pixel_style.evidence: Clean pixel art style preserved with dithered shading, readable silhouette, and consistent 2D forms throughout the scene.

requested_changes_visible.evidence: Bed removed and replaced with desk+laptop setup. Z's completely removed. Lighting changed from dark purple night to warm golden morning. Chicago skyline visible through window with morning glow.

artifact_free.evidence: No garbled text, floating glyphs, duplicated parts, or smeared objects. Clean render with proper pixel boundaries.

prop_layout_integrity.evidence: Trophy shelf present with single 10-day gold trophy on left side and single green succulent on right side - proper spacing between them. Single food bowl on floor to the right of desk. No overlapping props.

anchors_present.evidence: All required anchors visible: Byte at desk, oversized silver laptop open, wooden desk, Chicago skyline through window.

temporal_mood_match.evidence: Morning lighting with warm golden-pink tones through window matches night_to_morning transition. Byte awake at desk (no Z's), consistent with is_sleeping=false. Slightly groggy pose (hands on head) fits Sunday morning wake-up narrative.

reground_cleanup.evidence: Mode is normal, not reground. Check not applicable.
